thread.title: Stayed 6 nights in March 2017. Will definitly stay here again om my next visit
thread.title_full: Stayed 6 nights in March 2017. Will definitly stay here again om my next visit - Review of EVEN Hotel Times Square South, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: frher96
title: Stayed 6 nights in March 2017. Will definitly stay here again om my next visit
text:
The hotel has friendly staff and a healthy theme. I.e. there is training possibility with equipment in your room (!) and they have also a nice gym where you can exercise if you wish.
Room is cleaned and the felling is that the hotel is newly built. The location of hotel is very good with a subway entreance 50 meters from the hotel. Very close to Time Square and Madison Square Garden.
Very good value for the money (compare with other hotels in NYC)
